DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.SIB_ID) FROM PIS_StockInBill T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.SID_SIB_ID , T21.SID_SUPP_ID , SUM(ISNULL(T21.SID_Amount, 0)) 'TotalAmount' FROM PIS_StockInDetail T21 WHERE T21.SID_IsValid = 1 GROUP BY T21.SID_SIB_ID , T21.SID_SUPP_ID ) T2 ON T2.SID_SIB_ID = T1.SIB_ID INNER JOIN SM_Organization T3 ON T3.Org_ID = T1.SIB_Org_ID AND T3.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN FM_AccountPayableBill T4 ON T4.APB_SourceBillNo = T1.SIB_No AND T4.APB_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T5 ON T5.SUPP_ID = T2.SID_SUPP_ID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.SIB_Org_ID =#WHERE_SIB_Org_ID#
T1.SIB_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SIB_No#+'%'
T1.SIB_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SIB_SourceTypeName#
T1.SIB_SourceNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SIB_SourceNo#+'%'
T1.SIB_StatusName =#WHERE_SIB_StatusName#
T1.SIB_ApprovalStatusName =#WHERE_SIB_ApprovalStatusName#
T2.SID_SUPP_ID =#WHERE_SIB_SUPP_ID#
T1.SIB_IsValid=#WHERE_SIB_IsValid#
T1.SIB_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_DateStart# AND #_DateEnd# T1.SIB_CreatedTime >= #_DateStart#
T1.SIB_CreatedTime <= #_DateEnd#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.SIB_ID , T1.SIB_Org_ID , T1.SIB_No , T1.SIB_SourceTypeCode , T1.SIB_SourceTypeName , T1.SIB_SourceNo , T1.SIB_StatusCode , T1.SIB_StatusName , T1.SIB_ApprovalStatusCode , T1.SIB_ApprovalStatusName , T1.SIB_Remark , T1.SIB_IsValid , T1.SIB_CreatedBy , T1.SIB_CreatedTime , T1.SIB_UpdatedBy , T1.SIB_UpdatedTime , T1.SIB_VersionNo , T2.SID_SIB_ID , T2.SID_SUPP_ID 'SUPP_ID', T2.TotalAmount , T3.Org_ShortName , T4.APB_AccountPayableAmount , T4.APB_PaidAmount , T4.APB_UnpaidAmount , T5.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_StockInBill T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T21.SID_SIB_ID , T21.SID_SUPP_ID , SUM(ISNULL(T21.SID_Amount, 0)) 'TotalAmount' FROM PIS_StockInDetail T21 WHERE T21.SID_IsValid = 1 GROUP BY T21.SID_SIB_ID , T21.SID_SUPP_ID ) T2 ON T2.SID_SIB_ID = T1.SIB_ID INNER JOIN SM_Organization T3 ON T3.Org_ID = T1.SIB_Org_ID AND T3.Org_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN FM_AccountPayableBill T4 ON T4.APB_SourceBillNo = T1.SIB_No AND T4.APB_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T5 ON T5.SUPP_ID = T2.SID_SUPP_ID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.SIB_Org_ID =#WHERE_SIB_Org_ID#
T1.SIB_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SIB_No#+'%'
T1.SIB_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SIB_SourceTypeName#
T1.SIB_SourceNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SIB_SourceNo#+'%'
T1.SIB_StatusName =#WHERE_SIB_StatusName#
T1.SIB_ApprovalStatusName =#WHERE_SIB_ApprovalStatusName#
T2.SID_SUPP_ID =#WHERE_SIB_SUPP_ID#
T1.SIB_IsValid=#WHERE_SIB_IsValid#
T1.SIB_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_DateStart# AND #_DateEnd# T1.SIB_CreatedTime >= #_DateStart#
T1.SIB_CreatedTime <= #_DateEnd#
ORDER BY T1.SIB_CreatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

SELECT 1 'PrintCount' , T1.SID_ID , T1.SID_ID 'DetailID' , T1.SID_SIB_ID , T1.SID_SIB_No , T1.SID_SourceDetailID , T1.SID_Barcode , T1.SID_BatchNo , T1.SID_ThirdNo , T1.SID_OEMNo , T1.SID_Name , T1.SID_Specification , T1.SID_SUPP_ID , T2.SUPP_Name , T1.SID_WH_ID , T3.WH_Name , T1.SID_WHB_ID , T4.WHB_Name , T1.SID_Qty , T1.SID_UOM , T1.SID_UnitCostPrice , T1.SID_Amount , T1.SID_IsSettled , T1.SID_IsValid , T1.SID_CreatedBy , T1.SID_CreatedTime , T1.SID_UpdatedBy , T1.SID_UpdatedTime , T1.SID_VersionNo , T5.APA_Brand , T5.APA_VehicleBrand , T5.APA_VehicleInspire , T5.APA_VehicleCapacity , T5.APA_VehicleYearModel , T5.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeName , T5.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeCode , T5.APA_Level , T7.INV_ID FROM PIS_StockInDetail T1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.SID_SUPP_ID INNER JOIN PIS_Warehouse T3 ON T3.WH_ID = T1.SID_WH_ID LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T4 ON T4.WHB_ID = T1.SID_WHB_ID INNER JOIN BS_AutoPartsArchive T5 ON T5.APA_Barcode = T1.SID_Barcode INNER JOIN PIS_StockInBill T6 ON T6.SIB_ID = T1.SID_SIB_ID AND T6.SIB_No = T1.SID_SIB_No LEFT JOIN PIS_Inventory T7 ON T7.INV_Org_ID = T6.SIB_Org_ID AND T7.INV_Barcode = T1.SID_Barcode AND T7.INV_BatchNo = T1.SID_BatchNo AND T7.INV_WH_ID = T1.SID_WH_ID AND T7.INV_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.SID_IsValid = 1
T1.SID_SIB_ID=#WHERE_SID_SIB_ID# ORDER BY T1.SID_UpdatedTime DESC
